meanings.sent1: The owners of the house took good care of their garden.
meanings.sent2: The owners of the store were friendly and helpful to customers.
meanings.sent3: The owners of the bakery decided to have a cupcake-eating contest.
meanings.sent4: The owners of the antique shop held the key to the town's history.
meanings.sent5: The owners of the farm woke up early every day to tend to their animals.

meanings.definition: A person who has the legal right to something
meanings.sent1: The owners of the tickets were excited to attend the concert.
meanings.sent2: The owners of the land allowed hikers to explore its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The owners of the treasure map set off on a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent4: The owners of the winning lottery ticket celebrated their luck.
meanings.sent5: The owners of the company made important decisions about its future.
